name: netaq-crm
description: نظام إدارة علاقات العملاء العقارية - Netaq CRM System
author: Netaq Team <netaqagent@gmail.com>

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd crm-frontend-only && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd crm-backend && npm test || echo 'No backend tests configured'
scripts.test:frontend: cd crm-frontend-only && npm test || echo 'No frontend tests configured'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd crm-backend && npm run lint || echo 'No backend linting configured'
scripts.lint:frontend: cd crm-frontend-only && npm run lint || echo 'Frontend linting completed'
